page.title: 05HOUSING - a converted farm.
page.content:
My name is Tracey and my house is called 'Well House Farm'. It has been converted from a small farm house.
Upstairs there are seven rooms plus one airing cupboard. Downstairs there are ten rooms with a hall as well. The stairs have fourteen steps which are covered in a green carpet. There is an arch under my sister's bedroom and the house is made of old bricks.
There are outer buildings which consist of a garage, two stables and a boiler house. We have a swimming pool which is about seven feet deep and also a tennis court. There are three fields in which we keep a donkey, pony and sheep and where the dog and kitten play. We have a large garden that has flowers, evergreen trees and vegetables together with an orchard.
